Package ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.icwars.actor

Class Unit

java.lang.Object
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.actor.Entity
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.areagame.actor.AreaEntity
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.areagame.actor.MovableAreaEntity
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.icwars.actor.ICWarsActor
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.icwars.actor.Unit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Acoustics, Actor, Graphics, Interactable, Interactor, Updatable, Positionable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Soldier, Tank
public abstract class Unit extends ICWarsActor implements Interactor
A Unit is equivalent to a piece on a chess board. It's an entity that can be moved and interacts with other Units.

  • Field Details

    • handler

      private final Unit.ICWarsUnitInteractionHandler handler
      handler for the interactions

    • current_HP

      protected int current_HP
      The Unit's current health points. When this is less than or equal to 0 the Unit is dead.

    • maxHP

      protected int maxHP
      The maximum health points of the Unit.

    • repair

      protected int repair
      The amount that the Unit's current_HP recovers at the end of a turn.

    • radius

      protected int radius
      The cumulative vertical and horizontal distance that the Unit can move in one turn.

    • damage

      protected int damage
      The damage this Unit deals when it attacks.

    • hasAlreadyMoved

      protected boolean hasAlreadyMoved
      If this is true then the Unit has already been moved this turn.

    • actions

      protected ArrayList<Action> actions
      The list of actions the Unit can take.

    • name

      protected String name
      The name of the Unit.

    • sprite

      protected Sprite sprite
      The Unit's visual representation in the game.

    • range

      ICWarsRange range
      The collection of tiles that are in the Unit's range and that it can move to. See ICWarsRange.

  • Constructor Details

    • Unit

      public Unit (Area area, DiscreteCoordinates position, ICWarsActor.Faction faction, int repair, int radius, int maxHP, int damage, String name)
      Initialises a Unit class with full health.

      Calls Unit constructor with current_HP equal to maxHP.

      Parameters:
      area - The Area in which the Unit acts. Passed straight to the ICWarsActor constructor.
      position - The position that the Unit starts at in the Area. Passed straight to the ICWarsActor constructor.
      faction - The Faction to which the Unit belongs to. Passed straight to the ICWarsActor constructor.
      repair - The amount that the Unit's current_HP recovers at the end of a turn. Passed to repair.
      radius - The Unit's movement. Passed to radius.
      maxHP - The maximum health points that the Unit has. Passed to maxHP.
      damage - The damage that this Unit deals. Passed to damage

    • Unit

      public Unit (Area area, DiscreteCoordinates position, ICWarsActor.Faction faction, int repair, int radius, int current_HP, int maxHP, int damage, String name)
      Initialises a Unit class.
      Parameters:
      area - The Area in which the Unit acts. Passed straight to the ICWarsActor constructor.
      position - The position that the Unit starts at in the Area. Passed straight to the ICWarsActor constructor.
      faction - The Faction to which the Unit belongs to. Passed straight to the ICWarsActor constructor.
      repair - The amount that the Unit's current_HP recovers at the end of a turn. Passed to repair.
      radius - The Unit's movement. Passed to radius.
      current_HP - The health points the Unit starts with. Passed to current_HP.
      maxHP - The maximum health points that the Unit has. Passed to maxHP.
      damage - The damage that this Unit deals. Passed to damage

    • setHp

      public void setHp (int HP)
      Set's the Unit's current_HP whilst making sure that it's always greater than 0 and not more than maxHP.
      Parameters:
      HP - The new HP value of this Unit (not necessarily the resulting HP value).

    • setIsAlreadyMoved

      public void setIsAlreadyMoved (boolean isAlreadyMoved)
      Parameters:
      isAlreadyMoved - Sets hasAlreadyMoved to the input.

    • hasNotAlreadyMoved

      public boolean hasNotAlreadyMoved()
      Tells you if the Unit has not moved this turn.
      Returns:
      true if the Unit hasn't moved on this turn yet, false if it has.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Tells you if the Unit is alive.
      Returns:
      true if the Unit's HP is positive.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Tells you if the Unit is dead.

      Is the boolean opposite of isAlive().

      Returns:
      true if the Unit's current_HP isn't positive.

    • draw

      public void draw (Canvas canvas)
      Draws the Unit by calling ImageGraphics.draw(Canvas) on its sprite with the input Canvas.

      Implements Graphics.

      Specified by:
      draw in interface Graphics
      Parameters:
      canvas - The Canvas that the sprite is drawn on.

      Returns:
      The Unit's name.

    • completeUnitsRange

      private void completeUnitsRange()
      Fills the Unit's range with the nodes that are both within the surrounding square in a distance of radius and in the Area.

    • takeCellSpace

      public boolean takeCellSpace()
      Does this Unit take up space on the cell it's on.

      Implements Interactable.

      Specified by:
      takeCellSpace in interface Interactable
      Returns:
      false because this Unit doesn't take up space on the cell it's on.

    • changePosition

      public boolean changePosition (DiscreteCoordinates newPosition)
      If the node is in the Area and in the Unit's range it passes the new position on to super.changePosition.

      Then if fills the new range with completeUnitsRange().

      Overrides MovableAreaEntity.changePosition(DiscreteCoordinates).

      Overrides:
      changePosition in class MovableAreaEntity
      Parameters:
      newPosition - The new position for the Unit.
      Returns:
      Returns true if super.changePosition does so, and if the newPosition coordinates exist in the Unit's range.
